remarks: The predicate "is a limit point of a filter."  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Apr-2015.)  (Revised by Stefan O'Rear, 6-Aug-2015.)
statement:
flimval.1 $e |- X = U. J $.
elflim2 $p |- ( A e. ( J fLim F ) <-> ( ( J e. Top /\ F e. U. ran Fil /\ F C_ ~P X ) /\ ( A e. X /\ ( ( nei ` J ) ` { A } ) C_ F ) ) ) $.
